titles.title: Frank Moore Wild Steelhead Sanctuary Designation Act
A bill to designate the Frank Moore Wild Steelhead Sanctuary in the State of Oregon.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
5/21/2015--Introduced. Frank Moore Wild Steelhead Sanctuary Designation Act
Designates the approximately 104,000 acres of Forest Service land in Oregon as the Frank Moore Wild Steelhead Sanctuary.
